backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing CRUD-like APIs for mentors and video submissions using in‑memory maps with sortable listings and ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI text‑color updates to affected frontend files and components with associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files, mainly describing UI pages, components, and theme behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes and setting global foreground/background variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Router route tree and renders the router provider with all application pages.
Intersection‑observer based wrapper that animates children into view with fade/slide effects.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout component including header, footer, and outlet region for routed content.
frontend/src/components/CopyBlock.tsx: Utility component showing a title and copyable text block with visual feedback using clipboard API.
frontend/src/components/FieldMultiSelect: Popover‑driven multi‑select UI for choosing and displaying field tags with checkboxes and removable badges.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing logo, contact details, address, and attribution with themed text styling.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive header navigation with desktop and mobile menus highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/MindmapNav.tsx: Renders a multi‑step navigation grid linking to career-related pages with animated cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/SafeVideoEmbed.t: Parses a YouTube or Vimeo URL into a safe embed iframe or shows a fallback link if unsupported.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports placeholder contact info for email, phone, and address to be updated later.
frontend/src/data/careers.ts: Defines career interfaces and provides a list of fields and example careers with details like education and salary.
frontend/src/data/quiz.ts: Defines quiz structures, question data, and a scoring function that computes a result category based on answers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor instance and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMentors.ts: Wraps mentor-related actor calls with react-query for listing, fetching, and creating mentors.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideos.ts: Provides react-query hooks to list, fetch, and submit video submissions via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for theming, including light/dark modes and background styling with gradients and textures.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CareerQuizPage.tsx: Implements an interactive multi-step career quiz with progress tracking, answer handling, and result display.
frontend/src/pages/ExploreCareersPage.ts: Provides searchable and filterable browsing of career data with field-based relevance sorting.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main homepage with hero content, mindmap navigation, and information on university preparation.
frontend/src/pages/MentorConnectionsPage: Allows users to search for mentors or create mentor profiles, integrating forms, search filtering, and API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/MentorProfilePage.tsx: Displays a detailed mentor profile with qualifications, contact information, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Renders a resources page with tabs for essays, resumes, brag sheets, and email templates, using cards, accordions, and animated sections. Provides structured guidance content with expandable sections.
frontend/src/pages/SchoolTimelinePage.ts: Displays school exam timelines using cards and accordions, outlining AP, PSAT, and SAT dates and notes. Uses animated sections for layout transitions.
frontend/src/pages/VideoDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays details for a single video, including embedded playback, professional info, and navigation back to the videos list. Handles loading and error states with fallback UI.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Provides video browsing with search, plus a form to submit new professional videos. Shows loading states, empty results, and video cards linking to detail pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, animations, typography, container queries, and extended theme settings. Registers plugins and global design tokens for the app.
project_state.json: Captures the project's metadata, features, and current state, describing the app's backend, frontend, videos, resources, timeline, and assets. Serves as a structured overview for build and planning.
